verses.verse: But there shall be no gloom<WH4155> to her that was in anguish<WH4164>. In<WH6256> the former time<WH7223> he brought into contempt<WH7043> the land<WH776> of Zebulun<WH2074> and the land<WH776> of Naphtali<WH5321>; but in the latter<WH314> time hath he made it glorious<WH3513>, by the way<WH1870> of the sea<WH3220>, beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383>, Galilee<WH1551> of the nations<WH1471>.

The people<WH5971> that walked<WH1980> in darkness<WH2822> have seen<WH7200> a great<WH1419> light<WH216>: they that dwelt<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of the shadow of death<WH6757>, upon them hath the light<WH216> shined<WH5050>.

Thou hast multiplied<WH7235> the nation<WH1471>, thou hast increased<WH1431> their joy<WH8057>: they joy<WH8055> before<WH6440> thee according to the joy<WH8057> in harvest<WH7105>, as men rejoice<WH1523> when they divide<WH2505> the spoil<WH7998>.
For the yoke<WH5923> of his burden<WH5448>, and the staff<WH4294> of his shoulder<WH7926>, the rod<WH7626> of his oppressor<WH5065>, thou hast broken<WH2865> as in the day<WH3117> of Midian<WH4080>.
For all the armor<WH5430> of the armed man<WH5431> in the tumult<WH7494>, and the garments<WH8071> rolled<WH1556> in blood<WH1818>, shall be for burning<WH8316>, for fuel<WH3980> of fire<WH784>.

For unto us a child<WH3206> is born<WH3205>, unto us a son<WH1121> is given<WH5414>; and the government<WH4951> shall be upon his shoulder<WH7926>: and his name<WH8034> shall be called<WH7121> Wonderful<WH6382>, Counsellor<WH3289>, Mighty<WH1368> God<WH410>, Everlasting<WH5703> Father<WH1>, Prince<WH8269> of Peace<WH7965>.

Of the increase<WH4766> of his government<WH4951> and of peace<WH7965> there shall be no end<WH7093>, upon the throne<WH3678> of David<WH1732>, and upon his kingdom<WH4467>, to establish<WH3559> it<WH4941>, and to uphold it with justice<WH4941> and with righteousness<WH6666> from henceforth even for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>. The zeal<WH7068> of Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> will perform this<WH6213>.
The Lord<WH136> sent<WH7971> a word<WH1697> into Jacob<WH3290>, and it hath lighted<WH5307> upon Israel<WH3478>.
And all the people<WH5971> shall know<WH3045>, even Ephraim<WH669> and the inhabitant<WH3427> of Samaria<WH8111>, that say<WH559> in pride<WH1346> and in stoutness<WH1433> of heart<WH3824>,
The bricks<WH3843> are fallen<WH5307>, but we will build<WH1129> with hewn stone<WH1496>; the sycomores<WH8256> are cut down<WH1438>, but we will put cedars<WH730> in their place<WH2498>.
Therefore Jehovah<WH3068> will set up<WH7682> on high against him the adversaries<WH6862> of Rezin<WH7526>, and will stir<WH5526> up<WH5526> his enemies<WH341>,

the Syrians<WH758> before<WH6924>, and the Philistines<WH6430> behind<WH268>; and they shall devour<WH398> Israel<WH3478> with open mouth<WH6310>. For all this his anger<WH639> is not turned away<WH7725>, but his hand<WH3027> is stretched out still<WH5186>.
Yet the people<WH5971> have not turned<WH7725> unto him that smote<WH5221> them<WH1875>, neither have they sought Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.
Therefore Jehovah<WH3068> will cut off<WH3772> from Israel<WH3478> head<WH7218> and tail<WH2180>, palm-branch<WH3712> and rush<WH100>, in one<WH259> day<WH3117>.
The elder<WH2205> and the honorable<WH6440> man<WH1931>, he is the head<WH7218>; and the prophet<WH5030> that teacheth<WH3384> lies<WH8267>, he is the tail<WH2180>.
For they that lead<WH833> this people<WH5971> cause them to err<WH8582>; and they that are led<WH833> of them are destroyed<WH1104>.

Therefore the Lord<WH136> will not rejoice<WH8055> over their young men<WH970>, neither will he have compassion<WH7355> on their fatherless<WH3490> and widows<WH490>; for every one is profane<WH2611> and an evil-doer<WH7489>, and every mouth<WH6310> speaketh<WH1696> folly<WH5039>. For all this his anger<WH639> is not turned away<WH7725>, but his hand<WH3027> is stretched out still<WH5186>.

For wickedness<WH7564> burneth<WH1197> as the fire<WH784>; it devoureth<WH398> the briers<WH8068> and thorns<WH7898>; yea<WH3341>, it kindleth in the thickets<WH5442> of the forest<WH3293>, and they roll upward<WH55> in a column<WH1348> of smoke<WH6227>.

Through the wrath<WH5678> of Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> is the land<WH776> burnt<WH6272> up<WH5971>; and the people are as the fuel<WH3980> of fire<WH784>: no man<WH376> spareth<WH2550> his brother<WH251>.

And one shall snatch<WH1504> on the right hand<WH3225>, and be hungry<WH7457>; and he shall eat<WH398> on the left hand<WH8040>, and they shall not be satisfied<WH7646>: they shall eat<WH398> every man<WH376> the flesh<WH1320> of his own arm<WH2220>:

Manasseh <WH4519>, Ephraim<WH669>; and Ephraim<WH669>, Manasseh<WH4519>; and they together<WH3162> shall be against Judah<WH3063>. For all this his anger<WH639> is not turned away<WH7725>, but his hand<WH3027> is stretched out still<WH5186>.
